org.trianacode.gui.hci

Class MenuMnemonics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.MenuMnemonics

  • public class MenuMnemonics
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that handles setting mnemonics for menu items so that we don't get duplicated items.

      • createMenu

        public javax.swing.JMenu createMenu(java.lang.String name)
        Convenience method for creating a menu. This function creates the menu and sets the Mnemonic for the menu to the first letter of the name for the menu

      • getNextMnemonic

        public char getNextMnemonic(java.lang.String menuName)
        Parameters:
        menuName - The name of the JMenu
        Returns:
        The mnemonic for the JMenu that goes by this name

      • createMenuItem

        public javax.swing.JMenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String name,
                                   javax.swing.JMenu menu,
                                   java.awt.event.ActionListener target)
        Convenience method for creating a menu item. This function creates the menu and sets the Mnemonic (see below) for the menu . It then adds the menu item to the specified menu and sets the recevier of the actions from this menu item to the specified target.

      • createCheckBoxMenuItem

        public javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem createCheckBoxMenuItem(java.lang.String name,
                                                   javax.swing.JMenu menu,
                                                   java.awt.event.ItemListener target)
        Convenience method for creating a check box menu item. This function creates the menu and sets the Mnemonic (see below) for the menu . It then adds the menu item to the specified menu and sets the recevier of the actions from this menu item to the specified target.
